pkgmetadata.longdescription: ==============transmute-core==============.. image:: https://travis-ci.org/toumorokoshi/transmute-core.svg?branch=master :alt: build status :target: https://travis-ci.org/toumorokoshi/transmute-core.. image:: https://coveralls.io/repos/github/toumorokoshi/transmute-core/badge.svg?branch=master :alt: coverage status :target: https://coveralls.io/github/toumorokoshi/transmute-core?branch=master .. image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/code%20style-black-000000.svg :target: https://github.com/ambv/blackA utility library to help build transmute api generators for Python webframeworks.You can find out more here:http://transmute-core.readthedocs.io/
